author: Xbox
description:
Embark on your next journey and discover the joy of train simulation. Be ready for anything as you master formidable trains across 3 new routes. Unlock new skills and expand your hobby - Expect the Unexpected in Train Sim World 6!

Coming to Xbox on September 30!

Expand your collection further with 3 additional, brand-new trains in Deluxe / Specials Editions.
Deluxe / Special Edition pre-orders also include 5-day Early Access from September 25.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/train-sim-world-6-deluxe-edition/9NP29N1H0G4G

author: Xbox
description:
Chip 'n Clawz vs. The Brainioids is available now! 

A dynamic action-strategy game from the creator of X-COM Julian Gollop, this co-op friendly action RTS adventure features a Friend's Pass so your friend can play with you for free, across any platform.

The alien Brainioids have invaded Earth and stolen all our precious Brainium crystals in their Grav Spheres. Only Chip ‘n Clawz, a young inventor and his robo-cat, can thwart their evil plans by taking control of each sphere, all the way up to the Mothership itself!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/chip-n-clawz-vs-the-brainioids/9npdkb64p60t

author: Xbox
description:
In this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're diving into the big release of the day: Helldivers 2 is here! We're talking to Mikael Eriksson of Arrowhead Games and Corrine Robinson of Halo Studios about all things Helldivers 2, the ODST Warbond, and how everything came together behind the scenes.

00:00 Introduction
00:51 What is Helldivers 2?
04:00 ODST Legendary War Bond
05:36 Arrowhead and Xbox Partnership
08:36 Who Approached Who?
09:52 Community Response
14:36 Outro

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast

author: Xbox
description:
Put an end to the Pirate Guild's reign of terror and relive the thrills of the iconic anime in Space Adventure Cobra - The Awakening, now available on Xbox Series X|S!

Dive into a fast-paced action-platformer set in a rich and varied sci-fi universe. Use your gadgets to get out of dangerous situations and master your Psychogun to bend your shots for even greater effectiveness.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/space-adventure-cobra-the-awakening/9P0Z3RT5BKTZ

author: Xbox
description:
Set coordinates for the Terminid Hive Worlds – and pack the extra-strength bug spray. We’re exterminating the galaxy’s most disgusting infestation in a patriotic payback mission of no mercy. 

Abhorrent new enemy types, thrilling missions, strange worlds and spectacular beasts await the bravest Helldiver units. Did somebody call pest control?

Buy HELLDIVERS™ 2 today and prepare to inject a dose of managed democracy to enemies of Super Earth.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/helldivers-2/9MX9WN9DFPGT

description:
Plastic beach, meet concrete jungle. Gorillaz have crossed over and crash-landed into a whole new universe as the latest Fortnite Icons: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/fortnite-festival/9MZL842T57QN

Snag the 2D and Noodle Outfits now in the Item Shop with the Noodle & 2D Bundle, complete with themed cosmetics and the DARE Emote — and earn the Murdoc and Russel Outfits through the Fortnite Festival Season 10 Music Pass!

author: Xbox
description:
Vengeance begins. The wait is finally over, SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance, arrives this week!  Experience deep ninja action with thrilling combat against fierce enemies in a unique stylized world.
 
For those who purchase the Digital Deluxe Edition, enjoy 3-day early access and start playing NOW! Wield the katana, and obliterate all who stand in your way!
 
In SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance, you'll play as the legendary Shinobi Joe Musashi and discover your village burned to the ground and your clan turned to stone. You must set off on a quest for vengeance, ready to face an unparalleled evil to avenge your clan. 

Available August 29, 2025!  

Pre-order now: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/shinobi-art-of-vengeance-digital-deluxe-edition/9PH871JLFWPL
